extendedInfo.description: Lake that is power spot. It is said that the patron saint and Ground Dragon of the lake will live there. The power shakes the earth and defends people from all the misfortunes.Dragon Live Wallpaper"Dream Monday Family" can also use the wallpapers of this app.We recommend "Dream Monday Family" to the customer who purchased some our live wallpapers and want to use many wallpaper.https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dmf.wall.DMFLwpSub*To use:Menu>Wallpapers>LiveWallpapers->Ground Dragon Cave*Portrait only.*Please try the free version first.https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dmf.wall.GroundDragonCaveFree*The scrolling depends behavior of Home application.If scrolling does not work or something strange, try to check Home app's settings.(scrolling speed, overshoot, etc.)*Please resetting if the screen turn black when updating it with setting the wallpaper.

reviews.title: My other fav \"green\" one!
reviews.comment: Nice green & contrasted colors. I like the cave!
reviews.author: A Google User
